pageContext.claim: “And if you remember right before the payment was made. They took 10 sailors and they humiliated those sailors and they humiliated our country with the sailors down on their knees. And the other reason they released them was they wanted their first payment....But they released them because the money was due the following day. And they said, well we don't want to. Hey, why should they turn down 150 billion over the 10 sailors?”
pageContext.analysis: The Obama administration said at the time that the growing diplomatic contacts between the United States and Iran because of the nuclear deal led to a quick resolution of the seizure, after U.S. sailors had strayed into Iranian waters.
